Class AlertBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • AlertBox

  • public class AlertBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Prompts the user for a boolean answer to a question. Used commonly for validation requests from the user.
    Creation Date: 20/11/19.
    Last Modification Date: 8/12/19.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Szymon Grzech (988065)

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public boolean display(java.lang.String title,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Displays the "alert box" to the user and returns their answer. The prompt should be a yes or no question for which the user can choose to click one of the two buttons as their response.
        Parameters:
        title - String - What the title of the window is to be set to.
        message - String - The prompt to be displayed to the user.
        Returns:
        the boolean response. If the user clicked "Yes", this will be true. If "No", it will be false.
